quote: No matter how qualified or deserving we are, we will never reach a better life until we can imagine it for ourselves and allow ourselves to have it. – Richard Bach
fact: To Ensure Promptness, one is expected to pay beyond the value of service – hence the later abbreviation: T.I.P.
joke: Why don't eggs tell jokes? They'd crack each other up
